name: YAPP: Yet Another Puzzle Platformer
description: A challenging puzzle platformer in which you clone and teleport.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WIndows 7 64-bit or Above Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: directx9 / directx11 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
